import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './spiritDataActions.css' const MatchDataAdd = () => { const [sport_name, set_sport_name] = useState('') // const [dept_name1, set_dept_name1] = useState('') // const [dept_name2, set_dept_name2] = useState('') // const [dept_image1, set_dept_image1] = useState('') // const [dept_image2, set_dept_image2] = useState('') // const [location, set_location] = useState('') // const [date, set_date] = useState('') // const [day, set_day] = useState('') // const [time, set_time] = useState('') // const [is_finished, set_is_finished] = useState('') // const [score_result, set_score_result] = useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate() const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/api/matchs', { sport_name, dept_name1, dept_name2, dept_image1, dept_image2, location, date, day, time, is_finished, score_result }) navigate('/admin/match') } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (

TAMBAH PERTANDINGAN

set_sport_name(e.target.value)} placeholder='Nama Olahraga' />
{/*
set_dept_name1(e.target.value)} placeholder='Departemen 1' />
set_dept_name2(e.target.value)} placeholder='Departemen 2' />
set_dept_image1(e.target.value)} placeholder='Gambar Departemen 1' />
set_dept_image2(e.target.value)} placeholder='Gambar Departemen 2' />
set_location(e.target.value)} placeholder='Lokasi' />
set_date(e.target.value)} placeholder='Tanggal' />
set_day(e.target.value)} placeholder='Hari' />
set_time(e.target.value)} placeholder='Time' />
set_is_finished(e.target.value)} placeholder='Apakah Sudah Selesai?' />
set_score_result(e.target.value)} placeholder='Hasil' />
*/}
) } export default MatchDataAdd
